name: meshtastic-link-decoder
description: This tool decodes Meshtastic links and extracts the contact or channel information.

scripts.protogen: pbjs -t static-module -w es6 --no-verify --no-delimited --path . -o src/protobuf.js meshtastic/admin.proto meshtastic/apponly.proto && pbts -o src/protobuf.d.ts src/protobuf.js
